ConfigSettings.name: EnableSettingsEdit
ConfigSettings.desc: Used to enable the settings grid and its associated buttons in the UI.

ConfigSettings.name: CombatLogPath
ConfigSettings.desc: The path to the STO log folder.

ConfigSettings.name: CombatLogPathFilePattern
ConfigSettings.desc: The path used to select log files to parse from the CombatLogPath.

ConfigSettings.name: MaxNumberOfCombatsToDisplay
ConfigSettings.desc: The max number of combat instances to load and display. If set to zero, load them all.
